title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Bass Coast
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Description and travel

abstract: Nine stories from Bass Coast Shire, in south-eastern Victoria. Filmed as part of ACMI in the Regions program.
description: On Victoria's south-eastern coastline, lie several scenic seaside towns. The residents of Phillip Island, San Remo, Corinella, Bass, Inverloch, Kernot and Grantville talk about how each town enriches their lives, through its distinct character and community spirit.
